data.text: This is a recognition of the enormous value art has on healing people who had traumatic experiences --@antonioguterres at #PeaceIsEvent with @MIYAVI_OFFICIAL, @SonitaAlizadeh & more standing for @refugees - https://t.co/mp0YosuK4v https://t.co/BTRIgbwpPp
